extendedInfo.description: Venmo is the best way to pay your friends. Itâs fast, secure, and free.Featured in CNN, The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and TechCrunchâââââ âWhen it comes to sending and receiving money, this is the best.  Makes splitting the bill at dinner a dream.ââââââ âLove the interface and ease of Venmo!  Paying friends for whatever... Food rent drinks etc. has never been easier!  Itâs free!ââââââ âNo more excuses when splitting bills with your friends and colleagues; Venmo is an awesome app that lets you pay and receive funds in an easy fashion.  Highly recommended.ââââââ âItâs easily the best app for paying anyone.  Venmo will change your life forever!!ââââââ âVenmo is literally one of the most used apps on my phone. It has made hanging out with friends easier than ever, and has taken the pain out of splitting payments for anything, be it rent, food or even expensive items like electronics.âFeaturesâ¢  Make and share payments with friends for rent, utilities, dinner, drinks, movies, concert tickets, birthdays, laughs, and anything elseâ¢  Pay with your debit card or bank account for freeâ¢  Easily collect money from people who owe youâ¢  Transfer money you receive in your Venmo account balance to your bank account overnightâ¢  Bank-grade 256-bit encryption and Verisign Certifiedâ¢  Never write another check, pay an ATM fee, owe or be owed money again!Venmo is a subsidiary of Braintree, which powers the payments of LivingSocial, Airbnb, Fab, Angry Birds, Uber, Github, and many more awesome apps.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: You\'d be better off just going to the bank. My friend sent me money over 3 days ago and its out of his account but not in mine yet. There\'s no customer service phone # and the people who email me can\'t help they just keep telling me it will be in there tomorrow.... And it never is. I want to cancel the transaction and never use this ap again. I wouldn\'t refer anyone I know to use this.
reviews.author: Samantha Salicce

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Was working well before i wiped all the data on my phone.  Now after reinstalling the app it\'s impossible to retrieve my account. Won\'t let me make a new one with the same phone number, and when I click \"forgot password\" it gives me a connection error. Please fix.
reviews.author: Dan Tong

reviews.title: Works great on my S4
reviews.comment: Was able to spend the money the next day. Still figuring out how to use everything but so far so good! Keep updating and improving this app guys!
reviews.author: Rickesh Patel

reviews.title: Well done.
reviews.comment: Functional app and then some, and addressing and very tough problem that people are very skeptical of. #betterthancash
reviews.author: Evan Koschik

reviews.title: App no longer loads!
reviews.comment: News feed does not load, doesn\'t even load my profile. Please fix.. Broken app for now. On Nexus 4+7
reviews.author: Jerry S

reviews.title: Great service, horrible app
reviews.comment: Venmo works flawlessly to transfer money among my friends... on desktop. The Android app needs work though. It freezes often, once causing me to double charge my friend. The design is also one of the ugliest and unintuitive I\'ve seen for such a widely used app, not following standard Android guidelines. The lack of security is also disturbing - the default is for no identity verification before sending money
reviews.author: Jonathan Chan

reviews.title: Crappy customer service
reviews.comment: For some reason they decided to freeze my account. Contacted them and they simply said it was flagged with no explanation or a way to fix. Didn\'t even get to use the service once
reviews.author: Marcelino Hernandez

reviews.title: Good iOS app, but this is Android
reviews.comment: Obviously an iOS port with very little care for Android design guidelines.
reviews.author: Yarian Gomez

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is ridiculously convenient. Almost everyone at my college has it so it makes it super easy to pay each other for things right away.
reviews.author: Bernardo Campos

reviews.comment: Love the app. My only issue is getting it to upload a personal photo from my phones library.
reviews.author: Christine Cardoso

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load
reviews.comment: App never finishes loading my profile, feed, or notifications. Why would I trust it to load a money transfer?
reviews.author: Adam Pober

reviews.title: Discourages strong passwords
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t allow paste from clipboard into password field, so I can\'t use LastPass or similar password management with it.  Do they not want  strong passwords or something?
reviews.author: Lucas McCauslin

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: It crashes every time I try to use it
reviews.author: steven hill

reviews.title: No contact info
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me cash out and cannot find a contact phone number anywhere.
reviews.author: Patricia Fierro Scagliotti

reviews.title: No money
reviews.comment: I was supposed to be paid $7, but it never showed up on my account.   Lying/scam app. Paypal is better.
reviews.author: Jack Li

reviews.title: Great peer to peer payment app
reviews.comment: Venmo makes it super easy to send money to friends. Whether it\'s splitting a meal or cab, or sending rent to a roommate, venmo makes it fast and simple.
reviews.author: Daniel Ko

reviews.title: Split bills, pay friends back, money transfer
reviews.author: Fernando Miguel Ramirez Garcia
